normalized: as for me now, i did not hesitate.
oboro, i'm sending you back to hell.
it's only that alone.

name: asagi
normalized: ninja arts - sword battle petal
several hundred silhouettes fluttered about, oboro and her words too were cut short of life, together with all the people in the assembly hall.
my heartless blade tore to pieces both oboro and my lover kyousuke, driving the demons and oboro to the realm of the dead.
…it was quiet.
it had been only a few minutes when it was engulfed with delight, enjoying the murder match, excited with madness, it was quiet now.
now, every single life had gone out in the assembly hall.

every day refining our skills of the sword in the dojo together when we were young.
from my childhood friend, mutually of the opposite sex, that time we became aware of it together.

name: sakura
normalized: older sister…

normalized: …i'm sorry, sakura…

i thought about things like that suddenly.
in the assembly hall, a clapping noise was heard.
idiot!
there's still a survivor?
my ninja arts surely extinguished everyone.
that was magnificent.
that younger sister and your beautiful spirit

what?

edwyn black.
founder of all vampires and leader of the nomads.

name: asagi
normalized: sakura, since i'll buy you time, run away.

name: sakura
normalized: what are you saying!?

i shook my head sideways at sakura's words.

furthermore, sakura is injured, i've drastically lost my physical strength with my ninja arts.
even sacrificing my life to win the fight, and killing this man and the like, i had never thought foolishly like that.
me now thought nothing else but letting sakura escape.
fighting with this man, i wonder how much time i could even buy her?

i entered into a fighting stance.
